General.Name: Jagsonpal Pharmaceuticals Limited
General.Description: Jagsonpal Pharmaceuticals Limited engages in the manufacture and trading of pharmaceutical products and active pharmaceutical ingredients in the areas in the areas of women health, pain and analgesics, and general medicine in India and internationally. It offers pharmaceutical formulations and over the counter drugs in the areas of gynaecology, orthopaedics, and allergy management. It offers drugs in the form of tablets, softgels, injections, capsules, and syrups. The company was incorporated in 1978 and is headquartered in New Delhi, India.
General.Address: T-210 J, Shahpur Jat, New Delhi, India, 110049
